title: PJ Oldtown Foodcourt - Hakka Lui Char Stall
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This restaurant offers only one dish: Hakka lui cha (thunder tea rice), a traditional dish consisting of a bowl of rice with vegetables and nuts alongside a bowl of soup prepared from green tea and mint leaves. Tea soup is typically made with chicken stock, but this place makes its tea soup vegan. The only non-vegan ingredient is ikan bilis (dried anchovies) that can be added as a condiment. Request for vegetarian ("sayuran"), and you get the tofu-based variety of that condiment.
